title: Order of gifts
body:
I was planning on gifting a friend multiple gifts for her birthday, and I was wondering in what order do they recieve them

What I mean by this is; does she receive the newest or the oldest gift first

The reason why I am wondering this is so I can write a message across all of the gifts that when put together make a sentence

Ex: 
Gift1 = Happy 
Gift 2 = birthday
Gift 3 = Friend

or would it be the reversed order

it not that big of a deal, but if somebody could answer that would be nice
Thank you for reading

replies.body:
I've spoken to one of resident *hopeless romantic* who has done something just like this. He confirmed that this should work in the way you're assuming it does, where the gifts should be received in the order they're sent.

Good luck, and I hope your friend has a happy birthday indeed! ^.^
